comments.body:
I think we can just put this `cc_binary` back in `llvm_openmp/BUILD` and use`libname_os_specific` for `name` instead., i.e.,
```
cc_binary(
    name = libname_os_specific(),
    ...
)
```
and delete `libiomp5_cc_binary`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +62,66 @@# uses the same configuration as Linux, the following should work.
def libiomp5_cc_binary(libname, cppsources, srcdeps, common_includes):
    cc_binary(
        name = libname,
        srcs = cppsources + srcdeps +

comments.body:
Nit: We can refactor "libiomp5" out.
```suggestion
    return "libiomp5" + select_os_specific(L = ".so", M = ".dylib", W = ".dll")
```
Can we add a TODO to modify and use the one in `llvm` later? (For now I agree this is the best way to ensure merging in time.)
